Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Customer

  • public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the container that represents the Customer object. It includes multiple mutable fields such as the tier, and balance, but also includes immutable fields such as the file, username, and the password. AF(c) = customer such that customer has an immutable username, file, and password, and a mutable tier and balance. Rep Invariant: Customer such that the username and password is not null or empty, file has to exist, with valid field characters inside.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Customer(java.io.File file, java.lang.String name)
      Effects: constructs the customer object Requires: The customer file with information stored, the username of the customer Modifies: The customer fields: myTier, balance, password, username, file
